channel.title: [FM] Henry Stickmin Vig10er - Game Thread - Government (Town) Wins! (3/10)
channel.description:
![image|616x353](upload://gglZbgok7gGKN4LxovWI7kuxTOu)
# Welcome to Henry Stickmin Vig10er! Hosted by @EliThePsycho and @Intensify
# Rules
Follow the rules found here:
https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244?u=intensify
https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926?u=intensify
Additionally, for this game, a minimum requirement of **20 substantive, on-topic, game related posts** per in game day are required. Posts that are explicitly or obviously made solely for the purpose of meeting this requirement do not count towards the minimum, nor do posts containing *solely* a vote. The first time a player fails to meet this requirement, they will be given a warning; the second time they fail to meet it, they will be replaced out. A player who zero-posts will be subbed out without a warning. This requirement may be reduced or waived if an execution is hammered early by majority.
# Rolelist
[color=green]**Government Vanilla**[/color] [color=green]**Government Vanilla**[/color] [color=green]**Government Vanilla**[/color] [color=green]**Government Vanilla**[/color] [color=green]**Government Vanilla**[/color] [color=green]**Government Vanilla**[/color] [color=green]**Government Vanilla**[/color] [color=green]**Government Vigilante**[/color] [color=red]**Toppat Clan Goon**[/color] [color=red]**Toppat Clan Goon**[/color]
[details="Sample Role PMs (these flavors will not be present)"] > # [color=green]Captain H. J. Canterbury (Vanilla)[/color] > > > > Your weapons are your voice and your vote. Use them wisely.
> # [color=green]Henry Stickmin (Government Vigilante)[/color] > > > > Each night, you may target a player (not yourself). They die.
> # [color=red]Reginald Copporbottom (Toppat Clan Goon)[/color] > > > > You share a 24/7 private chat with your fellow members of the Mafia. Each night, the Mafia must kill a player outside your faction.
> # [color=red]Right Hand Man (Toppat Clan Goon)[/color] > > > > You share a 24/7 private chat with your fellow members of the Mafia. Each night, the Mafia must kill a player outside your faction. [/details]
# Gameplay
* This setup is a vig10er with Henry Stickmin flavor. Scum will be given flavor fakeclaims. Flavor solve at your own risk. * The uninformed majority is the **Government.** The informed minority is **Toppat Clan.** . There is absolutely no difference between these and town/mafia. * The **Toppat Clan** will communicate through a special Discord/Forum PM * No-execute is a valid vote, and may be hammered to end the day early. In cases where no-execute and another vote are tied at the end of the day, no-execute will have priority in the rand. * In cases where the votes are tied, the result will be randed with Discobot in spec chat. * Self votes are **not** valid votes. * **Toppat Clan** have a factional kill. It is mandatory, and must be performed every night. * All votes must be in the form **/vote [name of player]** (and ping the hosts/vc bots) to be considered valid, and all unvotes must be in the form **/unvote** (and ping the hosts/vc bots) This is to enable the smooth processing of votes. * Executions are both majority and plurality
# Playerlist
1. ~~min~~ - **[color=green]Calvin Bukowski [/color]** - Died Night 2 2. ~~SirDerpsAlot~~ - **[color=green]Norm Hexter[/color]** - Died Night 1 3. illumin8 4. Gorta 5. ~~Appelsiini~~ - **[color=red]Fredrick Muenster[/color]** - Executed Day 2 6. Light 7. ~~Marluxion~~ - **[color=green]Victoria Grit[/color]** - Died Night 1 8. ~~Jane~~ - **[color=green]Sarah Coniffers[/color]** - Executed Day 1 9. ~~Shurian~~ - **[color=green]Paul Ascott[/color]** - Died Night 2 10. ArcticXI
# Backups
1. Marshal 2. Chloe 3. katze 4. CRichard 5. Mistyx
# Spectators
1. Wazza 2. ATNoName 3. thepigeonnyc (uninformed) 4. astand 5. Amelia
# Threadmarks [Day 1 Begins!](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fm-henry-stickmin-vig10er-game-thread-day-2-7-10/86941/7?u=intensify) [Day 1 Ends! Jane (Sarah Connifers) is executed!](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fm-henry-stickmin-vig10er-game-thread-day-2-7-10/86941/1517?u=intensify) [Day 2 Begins! SirDerpsAlot (Norm Hexter) and Marluxion (Victoria Grit) is dead!](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fm-henry-stickmin-vig10er-game-thread-day-2-7-10/86941/1523?u=intensify) [Day 2 Ends! Appelsini (Fredrick Muenster) is executed!](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fm-henry-stickmin-vig10er-game-thread-night-2-6-10/86941/2172?u=intensify)

Ah yeah can never top me
